Text:
[II] Let us pray to God the Father, who out of His goodness, gives us the grace to wait for our Lord Jesus Christ to be revealed, let us say:
[IR] Show us, Lord, your mercy!
[I1] Lord, sanctify us spirit, soul, and body,
[I2] and keep us without blemish for the coming of your Son.
[I1] Today, make us walk in holiness,
[I2] as well as pursuing justice, and devout living in this world.
[I1] Allow us to cover ourselves with our Lord, Jesus Christ, 
[I2] and to be filled with the Holy Spirit.
[I1] Grant us enduring vigilance, Lord,
[I2] until the glorious manifestation of your Son.
Changes: 2022-12-05 - Paul Prins: Initial translation of these intentions.
